title: Ground state decay for Schr\"odinger operators with confining potentials
abstract:
We give two-sided estimates of a ground state for Schr\"odinger operators
with confining potentials. We propose a semigroup approach, based on resolvent
and the Feynman--Kac formula, which leads to a new, rather short and direct
proof. Our results take the sharpest form for slowly varying, radial and
increasing potentials.
